education.course: 인공지능 사물탑재 융합 제품 및 서비스 개발자 과정
education.description: This course covered AI integration into smart devices, including machine learning, IoT, and embedded systems.
Learned project-based Java and Spring framework backend development, including REST API and database integration.
Practical course focused on cloud web development, covering AWS, cloud architecture, and deployment strategies.
Studied data analytics, visualization, and processing using Python, with a focus on big data and cloud platforms.
AI career-focused program including machine learning, natural language processing, and AI ethics.
Focused on AI language models and NLP, including GPT and transformer models for text processing and generation.
Covered full-stack cloud development, emphasizing DevOps, CI/CD pipelines, and Kubernetes deployment.
Big data course focusing on Hadoop, Spark, and data pipeline architectures for large-scale data processing.
Studying information and data science, with coursework in data analysis, databases, machine learning, and statistics.
Studied telecommunications engineering, including network protocols, wireless communication, and signal processing.
